description.para: Priority 2 checkpoint 12.4 is not met if the is set to since no label can be provided for the time text box.
Enabling auto post back can break compliance with priority 1 checkpoint 6.3 if the post back is required for using the page.
Priority 2 checkpoints 6.4, 8.1, 9.2, and 9.3 are not met by the pop-up date picker. Since this feature is not required to fill out the date, it does not have to conform to WAI guide lines.
Priority 3 checkpoint 10.4 is not met. The control does not provide place-holder text for the date and time value text boxes.

remarks.para: During edit mode, the control is displayed using two controls, one for the date and the other for the time component. It also displays a pop-up date picker, toggled by an image with a scripted click event. The control uses a table for formatting.
During read-only mode, the control's value is displayed using a single .
These controls cannot be accessed directly, but the appropriate styles are applied.
